question:
You would like to invite a foreign friend to visit you for your
birthday
Write a letter inviting your friend. In your letter:
tell your friend about your birthday
explain how much the visit would mean to you
suggest that your friend stays at your house for the visit
text: How’re you? I am writing this to invite you to my birthday party on 2nd May 2022 at my place in Delhi.

Since this is going to be my 30th  birthday, I wanted to make this milestone of life, a huge celebration. Do you remember the TGIF restaurant?, I’ve mentioned you multiple times. It’s my favourite place! I’ve booked it for the party night.

I really wanted you to join me as it’s been a long we haven’t met. You’ve always supported me in my tough times when I was there with you in Abu Dhabi. This celebration will not be complete without your presence.

I guess, this is going to be your first trip to India, so if it is comfortable for you, I’ll arrange your stay at my house. That way we’ll also get more time to spend with each other. Moreover, my family is equally very excited to meet you.
Hoping you’ll make it to my birthday and see you soon,
